duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist brides and bridal parties in finding their ideal gowns from the bridesmaids collection
Provide expertise and recommendations to brides based on their style and preferences
Support the order fulfillment process to ensure timely deliveries and meet customer expectations
Maintain frequent communication with customers, handling inquiries and special requests
Deliver personalized and memorable customer service to each bride at the salon
Contribute to the upkeep and visual presentation of the flagship salon
Stay informed on fashion industry trends and forecasts to provide valuable insights and recommendations

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in fashion, retail management, sales, or a related field (preferred)
